actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to convey certain lands at Fort William H. Harrison, Montana to the State of Montana for a Montana State Veterans Cemetery.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey specified lands located within Fort William H. Harrison, Montana, to the State of Montana. Subjects such conveyance to the condition that such real property be used to establish a Montana State Veterans' Cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to convey certain lands at Fort William H. Harrison, Montana to the State of Montana for a Montana State Veterans Cemetery.
